solution_line_template: The house is {house_sqft} sq ft and the barn is {barn_sqft} sq ft so it's {house_sqft}+{barn_sqft} = <<{house_sqft}+{barn_sqft}={total_sqft}>>{total_sqft} sq ft
The price is ${price_per_sqft} per sq ft and it's {total_sqft} sq ft big so the property costs {price_per_sqft}*{total_sqft} = $<<{price_per_sqft}*{total_sqft}={property_cost}>>{property_cost}
